titleStmt.title: Cambridge Massachusetts, Harvard Law School, MS 32.

msItem.title: Magna carta with statutes; elementary treatises on land tenures, in French

history.provenance: Provenance: ‘Iste liber constat Thome de Rotsee’, 15th c., ?; ‘Rotsee’ changed to ‘Mone’ and then, inscr. ‘et ipse in custodia sua pro isto libro alium librum Johannis Soper de Staunton’, 15th–16th c.; gift of Lewis Stephens to Francis Gregors, d. 1747; George Dunn.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 1028, no. 32; ELMUSA, p. 21.

body.p:
Cambridge, Massachusetts, Harvard Law School
MS 32. Magna carta with statutes; elementary treatises on land tenures, in French. 140 ff. 235 x 76 mm.
Provenance: ‘Iste liber constat Thome de Rotsee’, 15th c., ?; ‘Rotsee’ changed to ‘Mone’ and then, inscr. ‘et ipse in custodia sua pro isto libro alium librum Johannis Soper de Staunton’, 15th–16th c.; gift of Lewis Stephens to Francis Gregors, d. 1747; George Dunn.
Bibliography: De Ricci, p. 1028, no. 32; ELMUSA, p. 21.
